    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        public java.lang.String normalize​(java.lang.String token,
                                  java.lang.String tag)
        This method retrieves the "adjectival" form of a given adverb, if it exists, when classified with a given PoS tag. Otherwise, it returns the same token (in lower case).
        Specified by:
        normalize in class Normalizer
        Parameters:
        token - the token whose lemma is wanted
        tag - the PoS tag of the token
        Returns:
        the normal form of the token (when with the given tag)
